outputs.name: financial_par
outputs.description:
A REoptParameter object that can be plugged into the 'DF
Run REopt' component.

inputs.name: _years_
inputs.description:
An integer for the number of years over which cost will
be optimized. (Default: 25).

inputs.name: _escalation_
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the escalation rate over
the analysis. (Default: 0.023).

inputs.name: _tax_
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the rate at which the owner/host
of the system is taxed. (Default: 0.26).

inputs.name: _discount_
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the discount rate for the
owner/host of the system. (Default: 0.083).

inputs.name: _wind_cost_
inputs.description:
A number for the installation cost of wind power in US dollars
per kW. (Default: 3013).

inputs.name: _pv_cost_
inputs.description:
A number for the installation cost of photovoltaic power in US
dollars per kW. (Default: 1600).

inputs.name: _storage_cost_
inputs.description:
A number for the installation cost of power storage in US
dollars per kW. (Default: 840).

inputs.name: _gener_cost_
inputs.description:
A number for the installation cost of generators in US dollars
per kW. (Default: 500).

name: DF REopt Financial Parameters
description:
Customize the financial settings of a REopt analysis.
-
